body:
[Ersilia, the Trustworthy] a short girl is standing and drinking some coffee, she's not in a hurry. 

[1]: "Hello, do you, like, know who I am?" 
[2][leave her alone]
title: Start1

body:
[Ersilia, the Trustworthy] "Yeah, like, everyone here knows you" 

[1]: "That doesn't sound right, are you sure?" 
[2]:"That sure is true, I'm a *Really* cool guy"
[3]:"Nice, then what's my name?"
title: KnowMe

body:
[Resonance]: "She's holdin a faint smile, that was just a harmless. friednly joke.."

[1]: "Hah, nice one" [Leave]
title: ThinkPass

body:
[Ersilia, the Trustworthy]: The girl shrugs and stop paying atention to you. You're left with what she said to think about. 

[1]: [Leave]
title: ThinkFail

body:
[Ersilia, the Trustworthy] "Yup, you're called *Ambrosius* "

[Clairvoyance]: "You don't actually know your name, but it sure isn't *Ambrosius*. Better not think about it" 

[1]: [Think about it]
[2]:[Laugh and ignore]
title: Name

body:
[Clairvoyance]: "You can't recall your name, but you will, eventually."

[1]: "Hah, nice one" [Leave]
title: ThinkPass

body:
[Clairvoiance]: "You're thinking too much. Your head hurts. No awnesr is found" . (-1 Reason) 

[1]: " Humm... thanks? I need a moment[Leave]"
title: ThinkFail

body:
[Ersilia, the Trustworthy] a short girl is standing and drinking some coffee, she's not in a hurry. 

[1]: Hello?[End]
title: Hey

body:
[Ersilia, the Trustworthy] a short girl is standing and drinking some coffee, she's not in a hurry. 

[1]: "Hey, i need to find some stuff, could you help me?" 
[2] "it's nothing, actually" [End]
title: Start2

body:
[Ersilia, the Trustworthy] "What do you mean? You lost your wallet or somethin'?" 

[1]: "I actually have to find some *Items*" 
[2] "Nah, forget about it" [End]
title: Stuff

body:
[Ersilia, the Trustworthy] "What are you talking about?" 

[1]: "The elevator guy needs a *Toolbox*, a *Zip tie* and some *Coffee*"
[2] "I just *need* coffee"
[3]"forget about it" [End]
title: Items

body:
[Ersilia, the Trustworthy] Okay, sure, i think i know this. Let's start: "

[Clairvoyance]: "Wait a moment" 

[1] [Continue]
title: Help

body:
[Ressonance]: "You can't trust her. She'll lie. She'll try to mock you."

[1]: " [Continue]
title: LyingFail

body:
[Ressonance]: Don't fully trust her tips. She's just messing around. 

[1]: " [Continue]
title: LyingPass

body:
[Ersilia, the Trustworthy] I think Camelia should have some spare coffee, and Efrim has a bunch of zipties for some reason...: "

[Clairvoyance]: It's actually the other way around, probably 

[1]"How about the toolbox?" 
[2]"Thanks, bye" [end]
title: List

body:
[Ersilia, the Trustworthy] "You actually had one of those on your room, didn't ya?": "

[Clairvoyance]: "That's the most absurd thing you heard today. It's probably true" 

[1]"Sure, thank you"[end]
title: ToolBox
